Articles.Content:
i had uncles that were in WWII although outside of that i have a half sister who was a combat nurse and a grampa wo almost fought in the korean war

the user below has dead relatives (not necessarily recently)

I want you to think about that question really hard, okay?

The user below me watches the Rooster Teeth podcast.

Nope. Seen some of their work, not their podcasts.

The user below me has a name starting with "X."

Nope

The user below me is a conspiracy theorist.
Nope. The user below me realizes I just replied to "MrrGrapefruit" (Pamplemousse is french for Grapefruit, or so I'm told)

Eyup, it's the exact translation. I'm French-Canadian :3

The user below me didn't know I was French-Canadian.

True, but why are you a grapefruit?

The user below me is NOT mrrpamplemousse

I... I think...

The user below me works in Aerospace Engineering.

False. I am the Chief Test Pilot and Engineer of the Kerbal Military.

The user below me has a steam account.

Absolutely. That's what I play my KSP on!

The user below me does NOT have a Steam account.

False, yet I still play KSP through the .exe and always will.

The user below me is interested in motor racing.

Not realy.

The user below me is introvert.

Nope

The user below me killed Jeb on their first flight in 0.23.5

I'll admit to that, I'm sad...

The user below me has thought about taking a water buffalo into space at one point or another.

Umm... *furiously plans to take a water buffalo into space*

The user below me knows what rocket fuel is made of.

True. Either Solid Fuel or Liquid fuel and Oxidiser

The user below me knows what liquid fuel, solid fuel and oxidiser is made of

Stuff that goes boom, stuff that goes bang, and stuff that goes psshhhhhhhhh

The user below me knows why it goes boom, bang, and psshhhhhh

True, poor designing ability.

The user below me know the answer to The Ultimate Question of Life, the Universe, and Everything.

Yeah!. Its 42

The user below me knows how to make rocket propellant out of lemons!

True. I'm gonna get my engineers to invent a combustible lemon that burns your house down!

The user below me know's who I've just quoted.

Unfortunately, yes.

The user below is blue.

False. I am green.

The user below me has more than 10 games on their steam account.

Unfortunately not...

The user below me is a rabid monkey eater.

No... not quite...

The user below me prefers to be an anti-hero.

False

The user below me is married.
